alert.note: Alert for Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:49PM EDT until July 28 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL WOLFE COUNTY... At 248 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pine Ridge, or over Campton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Campton around 300 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Gosneyville, Stillwater, Trent, Landsaw and Hazel Green. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
